name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David PHILLIPS, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
POMEROY, Former Justice, did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David PHILLIPS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
POMEROY, Former Justice, did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas E. Seus, Kelly, Moran & Harrington, Mary McNeill Greenwell, Barry H. Denker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Wm. C. Turnoff, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
395 A.2d 273
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David PHILLIPS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 13, 1978.
Decided Dec. 29, 1978.
Thomas E. Seus, Kelly, Moran & Harrington, Mary McNeill Greenwell, Barry H. Denker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Wm. C. Turnoff, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
